name: Core Logic
tagline: Software for web, mobile and IT infrastructure
description:
We're CoreLogic and we provide high-tech web and mobile solutions. We create advanced web and mobile applications for banking, finance and business sectors. Most of our solutions include very robust logic and architecture.
In our projects we use many RedHat solutions like JBoss Enterprise Application Platform, Wildfly, SwitchYard and JBoss Fuse. We develop in Java EE with JSF/Primeface/Richfaces oraz JS frameworks as Angular or React. We love HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript. We create mobile applications for Android and iOS. Sometimes they're hybrid, then we use AngularJS.
